snippet: Although the report’s authors are only to say whether such weapons were used, not who used them, their evidence appears likely to implicate the Syrian government.
abstract: Experts' report to United Nations on Syrian mass killing that is believed to have involved chemical weapons is expected within a few days, and will focus on whether such weapons were used, and not who used them.
lead_paragraph: Although the report’s authors are only to say whether such weapons were used, not who used them, their evidence appears likely to implicate the Syrian government.

headline.main: Experts’ Report to U.N. on Syrian Mass Killing Is Expected Within a Few Days
headline.print_headline: Experts’ Report to U.N. on Syrian Mass Killing Is Expected Within a Few Days
